Articles.Content:
So, it's my b-day today and I got a new PC with an i7 970 and 12 gigs of 1333MHz RAM. It had an HD6850 gfxcard but I'll keep my ol' trustworthy 660Ti. I'm gonna move all 3 of my disks over and reinstall Windows on my SSD disk. I really felt like sharing my happiness.

Happy new year, everyone!
Happy Birthday ... bednieri dabadebis dghe! gilocav!

bednieri dabadebis dghe! gilocav!

Pardon?

On topic, the computer upgrade was a minor flop; first of all, my HDDs won't fit in them atm, a fix is yet to be thought of. Also, it won't even do anything because my 660Ti requires dual power plugs and the power supply only has one that fits. However, my dad, being generally awesome, has a way to fix that.
That's Georgian for 'happy birthday! congratulations!'. I've been learning Georgian, not an easy task for me.

Oh, LOL.

On another not, my new PC is now up and running.
